document.docAuthor: Hielkema, Auke J. & Hielkema, Meindert A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Scarabaeoidea (Insecta: Coleoptera) of the Guianas

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Scarabaeoidea (Insecta: Coleoptera) of the Guianas

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Phanaeus ( Notiophanaeus ) chalcomelas grossii Arnaud 2001: 5
( Bolivia ) -
Edmonds and Zídek 2012: 11
(syn. nov.)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note 1. In his treatment of
Phanaeus chalcomelas , H. W. Bates (1868: 90)
writes: “Perty states that his species was taken in southern Brazil . I believe this locality is erroneous like many others given by this author.”

Note 2. Edmonds (1994: 28 , 100) includes parts of Venezuela in the distributional map of
Phanaeus chalcomelas
, but fails to mention this country anywhere in the text. As we are unaware of any actual records from Venezuela , we regard the occurrence of this species there as possible but in need of confirmation.
